channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @avishaiw I think we’re about due for a sci-fi/action/Chanukah special.
item.source:markdown: @avishaiw I think we’re about due for a sci-fi/action/Chanukah special.

item.description:
@joshtpm But: Weren’t those boxes material that the Archives was expecting? In other words, documents that had already been cataloged? Which means these would be specific documents known by name and not by content?

@joshtpm Which is to say, not plans for stealth fighters, but documents generated in the course of ordinary business (and automatically named) but not yet archived?

@joshtpm If that is the case — and I could well be misremembering the facts of the Archives reporting — documents from 1/6 would fit the bill.

@joshtpm Could possibly be the sort of memo or emailed order to the National Guard that used to be called “a smoking gun” back in the day.

@joshtpm Could well be more prosaic, of course. But something to consider before rising to attack the warranted seizure of documents
@emptywheel Sad to believe he’s the heir of a publication which once published Hannah Arendt.
item.source:markdown: @emptywheel Sad to believe he’s the heir of a publication which once published Hannah Arendt.

item.description: @FoundEpisodes But in Trek world, probes have a tendency to turn on their sender with extreme prejudice — as in this picture of Voyager.
item.source:markdown: @FoundEpisodes But in Trek world, probes have a tendency to turn on their sender with extreme prejudice — as in this picture of Voyager.

item.description: @datadivajf They really should bring her into one of the animated series.
item.source:markdown: @datadivajf They really should bring her into one of the animated series.

item.description: @aravosis I suspect someone first conspired to commit said felony. And a co-conspirator told the FBI about it.
item.source:markdown: @aravosis I suspect someone first conspired to commit said felony. And a co-conspirator told the FBI about it.

item.description: @mjs_DC Except for mishandling classified documents.

item.description:
@JamesFallows So if you had been assigned to write the post-FBI raid speech/social media post, what world you have said?

@JamesFallows Desperately trying to imagine the scenario where the FBI executes a search warrant on Carter’s safe in Plains.

@JamesFallows Presumably it’s a lead safe, where the former president has stashed some Kryptonite stolen from NASA, because he’s worried by what Superman might do under Reagan’s control…. https://t.co/ay5dEylyfg
@trekonomics And FBI confirms. https://t.co/DzKkFyrg5a
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics And FBI confirms. https://t.co/DzKkFyrg5a

item.description: @leahmcelrath @joshtpm Yes.
item.source:markdown: @leahmcelrath @joshtpm Yes.

item.description: @swordsjew Tell me you haven’t committed multiple felonies that could lead the FBI to be granted a warrant to rifle through your safe without…..
item.source:markdown: @swordsjew Tell me you haven’t committed multiple felonies that could lead the FBI to be granted a warrant to rifle through your safe without…..

item.description:
@alangblake @joshtpm First, reported income over 500k doesn’t include the people earning 500k but reporting 200k — committing $100k fraud. Each year. So well more than $150k for a multi year audit.

@alangblake @joshtpm Second,are you against all law enforcement, or only those who might catch rich people?
item.source:markdown:
@alangblake @joshtpm First, reported income over 500k doesn’t include the people earning 500k but reporting 200k — committing $100k fraud. Each year. So well more than $150k for a multi year audit.
@alangblake @joshtpm Second,are you against all law enforcement, or only those who might catch rich people?

item.description: @alangblake @joshtpm You’re saying an IRS agent can’t find $150k/year if unleashed? Surely you’re joking. And at odds with all that is known and suspected about tax fraud.
item.source:markdown: @alangblake @joshtpm You’re saying an IRS agent can’t find $150k/year if unleashed? Surely you’re joking. And at odds with all that is known and suspected about tax fraud.

item.description: @alangblake @joshtpm Plenty of dudes putting $8000 Manhattan rent and upscale groceries on their LLC’s corporate card and only reporting the remainder to the IRS and their ex-wives.
item.source:markdown: @alangblake @joshtpm Plenty of dudes putting $8000 Manhattan rent and upscale groceries on their LLC’s corporate card and only reporting the remainder to the IRS and their ex-wives.

item.description: Get yourself a physician not in the pay of Big Pancreas. https://t.co/W3JIoKtdv0

item.description: @delong @CaraGuha @Popehat Since part of his job is not saying the quiet part aloud, it would seem to be defamatory. Absent the tweet being rebroadcast to a bigger audience, it’s hard to imagine any actual damages. (And that’s putting aside the satirical commentary defense.)
item.source:markdown: @delong @CaraGuha @Popehat Since part of his job is not saying the quiet part aloud, it would seem to be defamatory. Absent the tweet being rebroadcast to a bigger audience, it’s hard to imagine any actual damages. (And that’s putting aside the satirical commentary defense.)
